person.persName: David W. Miller (Jeffersonville, Indiana, warden of Indiana State Prison-South)

body.p: Clark County, Indiana, prison warden. Pennsylvania native. Married to Letitia Huff Miller in Floyd County, Indiana, on November 14, 1840. Father of Sarah A. Miller and Florence M. Miller. Carpenter in New Albany, Indiana, in 1850. Warden of the Indiana State Prison, South, in Jeffersonville from 1860 to 1863. Warden of the Indiana State Prison, South, in Jeffersonville in 1865.
